comments:
1.  Create a launch config for a class that contains a main type.
2.  Launch the debug session
3.  Rename the class to something else.  
4.  Select the launch from the Debug View.

The launch config is renamed accordinlgy to the new name of the class.  As a result that launch config no longer exists.
